title: Looking for 2 fonts
content:
Could you please help me to identify these 2 fonts.  
I would love to use some on my website.

Thanks!!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [monster.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830073539/http:/typophile.com/files/monster.png) | 12.66 KB |
| [Taart.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830073539/http:/typophile.com/files/Taart.png) | 6.24 KB |
author: Jelle85

comments.content: Taart: can't be 100% positive if it's the one but [Steiner](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830073539/http:/www.dafont.com/steiner.font) looks enough close to do the job.
I would say; close enough for me!! Thanks!!
Anyone here who knows the monster font??????? :)

Sorry, wasn't able to spot a match for this "monster". May be it's hand-drawn... Anyway, probably useless but here are some alternatives: [Lane Humouresque](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830073539/http:/www.urbanfonts.com/fonts/Lane_Humouresque.htm), [Viva La Vida](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830073539/http:/www.dafont.com/viva-la-vida.font) and [janda Everyday](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830073539/http:/www.dafont.com/janda-everyday-casual.font) by [Kimberly Geswein](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830073539/http:/www.dafont.com/kimberly-geswein.d1468))
